title: Retribution
description: Semi-finalist in The Kindle Book Review's 2013 Best Indie Book AwardsNICK CLARKSTONI joined Interpol to take down the Mafia don father I barely knew. The man who abandoned my mother, the man who destroyed my whole world.He’s a clever monster, but he’ll never see me coming. Not when I strike a deal with his greatest enemy.The only things I didn’t count on?Falling in love with a Mafia princess.And walking into a trap of my own design.DELFINA ANDRETTIMy father thinks all I’m good for is marrying me off to forge an alliance with another family.But I have other ideas. I have goals. I have ambitions. And pumping out babies for a man I don’t care about isn’t on the list.hen Nick Clarkston walks into my life, I see my ticket out.And I know what he’s hiding.
author: Dana Delamar
